title: Atashin'chi Movie
synopsis: In a stormy night, Mikan and Mom were stricken by lightning simultaneously and switched bodies. In the following days, while Mom enjoyed being a student again, Mikan had to fought with house chores. Meanwhile, Yuzuhiko and Dad were busy looking for a way to switch them back.
staff: [['Yasumi, Tetsuo', ['Director']], ['Mukouda, Takashi', ['Key Animation']], ['Masuda, Toshihiko', ['Key Animation']], ['Mogi, Takuji', ['Key Animation']]]
